column2:
Congrats on being accepted to the WITHIN community! You’ll be able to meet other awesome young techies to learn about different products, companies, industries and experiences while growing your professional network.

Each week we’ll send you a recommendation of someone that’s relevant to your interests. Send them a message - you never know what you might learn! Be sure to give props to those that help you by saying ‘Thanx.’ 

Your profile may also be recommended to someone else, and they will be able to reach  out to you for advice. Giving back is an important value of our community, and receiving Thanx helps you get recognized as an influencer. (which has fun offline perks - trust us!) 

That’s it from us. Now go meet some awesome people and learn something new!
just gave you Thanx! See what they said.
A new week, a new recommendation just for you. See who it is!
Your recommendation's 'bout to expire. Message them before they're gone!
- You’re IN! Come check out your first recommendation.
